lyric:
[by:丼眠]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Michael Hoppé
[00:01.000] 作词 : Elizabeth Barrett Browning
[00:06.48]How do I love thee? Let me count the ways.
[00:11.21]I love thee to the depth and breadth and height
[00:15.20]My soul can reach, when feeling out of sight
[00:18.18]For the ends of Being and ideal Grace.
[00:22.65]I love thee to the level of everyday's
[00:25.04]Most quiet need, by sun and candlelight.
[00:29.37]I love thee freely, as men strive for Right;
[00:34.36]I love thee purely, as they turn from Praise.
[00:37.85]I love thee with the passion put to use
[00:40.62]In my old griefs, and with my childhood's faith.
[00:45.00]I love thee with a love I seemed to lose
[00:47.52]With my lost saints,--I love thee with the breath,
[00:51.68]Smiles, tears, of all my life!--and, if God choose,
[00:57.65]I shall but love thee better after death.
tlyric:
[by:野生大熊猫]
[00:06.48]我是多么爱你？让我细细数来。
[00:11.21]当感受淡出视线之外时
[00:15.20]我的灵魂可以才能够达到我爱你的深度、广度、高度
[00:18.18]生命尽了还有全部的祈祷
[00:22.65]我爱你的程度达到每天
[00:25.04]不可或缺，就像太阳和烛光一样
[00:29.37]我慷慨的爱你，就像人类为正义而战
[00:34.36]我纯洁的爱你，就像人类带来的称赞
[00:37.85]我爱你用尽我所有的激情
[00:40.62]在我暮年悲痛时，我爱你如童年的信仰
[00:45.00]我爱你似乎要失去我这个
[00:47.52]虔诚的信徒--我与生命中的呼吸
[00:51.68]微笑和眼泪一起爱着你！-还有，如果上帝让选择的话
[00:57.65]我死后应会更加的爱你。
